title: SpendChecker chi check spend, khong rotate key khi loi
description: SpendChecker should only monitor USD spend and update key spend stats. It must not rotate keys on threshold hit, budget_exceeded, or non-spend API errors. Keep request-path rotation behavior unchanged outside SpendChecker.
close_reason: Shipped: SpendChecker now only checks spend and no longer rotates keys on threshold/budget/error paths; tests and review passed

close_reason: Shipped: GLM-4.6 → GLM-5 via Modal provider. New modal package, routing in main.go, config updated. Double-resolution bug fixed. Build+test+vet pass.

title: Response model name masking - rewrite upstream model in response body
description: When proxy routes to GLM-5 but user requested e.g. claude-sonnet-4-5, rewrite the model field in both streaming SSE chunks and non-streaming JSON responses to match the user's original requested model. This prevents SDK/API users from seeing the actual upstream model name.
close_reason: Shipped: model masking for stream/non-stream responses with provider coverage and tests
